leave.casual: Employees get 12 casual leaves per year. They can be taken with prior approval from the manager. Casual leaves cannot be clubbed with more than 3 consecutive days without special approval.
leave.sick: Employees get 10 sick leaves per year. Medical certificate required for leaves exceeding 3 consecutive days. Sick leave can be availed without prior intimation in case of emergency.
leave.earned: Employees earn 1.5 earned leaves per month, totaling 18 per year. Maximum accumulation is 30 days. Unused earned leaves can be encashed at the time of resignation.
leave.maternity: Female employees are entitled to 26 weeks of paid maternity leave. Can be availed from 8 weeks before expected delivery date. Maternity leave includes pre and post-natal benefits.
leave.paternity: Male employees get 5 days of paid paternity leave within 3 months of child birth. Can be taken continuously or in split mode.
leave.unpaid: Unpaid leave can be taken in exceptional circumstances with manager and HR approval. Maximum 30 days unpaid leave allowed per year.
leave.carryForward: Maximum 5 casual leaves can be carried forward to next year. Carried forward leaves must be utilized within first quarter of new year.
leave.bereavement: 3 days paid bereavement leave for immediate family members (parents, spouse, children, siblings). Additional unpaid leave can be requested.
leave.marriage: 5 days paid marriage leave for employee's own marriage. Can be clubbed with other leaves. Must be availed within 3 months of marriage date.
leave.adoption: Adoptive parents get 12 weeks paid adoption leave. Applicable for children below 3 years of age.
leave.sabbatical: Sabbatical leave of 3-6 months available after 5 years of service. Subject to management approval and business requirements.
leave.application: Leave applications must be submitted at least 3 days in advance except for sick leave and emergencies. Late applications may be rejected.
leave.cancellation: Approved leaves can be cancelled with mutual agreement between employee and manager. No penalty for emergency cancellations.
leave.halfDay: Half-day leave (4 hours) can be taken with manager approval. Two half-day leaves count as one full day leave.
leave.leaveDuringNotice: Leave during notice period is generally not allowed unless approved by manager and HR. Emergency situations will be considered on case basis.

salary.structure: Salary includes Basic Pay (40%), HRA (30%), Special Allowance (20%), and Other Allowances (10%). Detailed salary breakup provided in offer letter.
salary.paymentDate: Salary is credited on the last working day of each month. If last day is a holiday, salary is credited on previous working day.
salary.increment: Annual increments are performance-based and typically range from 8-15%. Increment cycle is April to March. Performance review in February-March.
salary.bonus: Annual performance bonus ranges from 10-20% of annual salary based on company and individual performance. Bonus paid in April of each year.
salary.advance: Salary advance up to 50% of monthly salary available in emergency situations. Must be repaid within 3 months through salary deduction.
salary.arrears: Salary arrears due to increments or promotions are paid in the following month's salary along with back-dated calculation.
salary.deductions: Standard deductions include PF (12% of basic), Professional Tax, TDS as per IT rules. Detailed deduction slip available in payroll portal.
salary.paySlip: Monthly pay slips are available on employee self-service portal by 5th of every month. Can be downloaded in PDF format.
salary.variablePay: Variable pay component is 20% of CTC for sales roles, 15% for managerial roles. Paid quarterly based on target achievement.
salary.ctc: CTC (Cost to Company) includes all salary components, employer's PF contribution, gratuity provision, insurance premiums, and other benefits.
salary.reimbursement: Salary includes reimbursements for mobile (₹1,500), internet (₹500), and fuel (as per actual bills with ₹5,000 cap).
salary.revision: Salary revisions happen annually in April. Off-cycle revisions possible for exceptional performance or promotions.
salary.foreignPosting: Employees on foreign assignments receive international salary with forex allowance, housing, and relocation benefits.
salary.minimumWage: Company ensures all salaries comply with minimum wage laws of respective states and central government guidelines.

benefits.health: Company provides comprehensive health insurance covering employee and immediate family (spouse and 2 children). Sum insured: ₹5 lakhs. Includes pre and post hospitalization, ambulance charges.
benefits.pf: Provident Fund: Company contributes 12% of basic salary, employee contributes 12%. PF account created with EPFO. Withdrawals allowed as per EPFO rules.
benefits.gratuity: Gratuity is payable after completing 5 years of service. Calculated as 15 days salary for each completed year of service. Paid at time of resignation or retirement.
benefits.food: Subsidized cafeteria available. Employees pay only 30% of actual cost. Breakfast, lunch, and evening snacks provided. Monthly meal allowance: ₹2,000.
benefits.gym: Company sponsors gym membership up to ₹5,000 per year. Employees can choose any gym. Reimbursement on submission of membership receipt.
benefits.books: Book allowance of ₹10,000 per year for professional development. Can be used for technical books, online course subscriptions, magazines.
benefits.esi: ESI (Employee State Insurance) applicable for employees with gross salary below ₹21,000 per month. Covers medical benefits for employee and family.
benefits.groupLife: Group life insurance of 4x annual salary provided by company. No employee contribution required. Nominee receives amount in case of death.
benefits.accidental: Group personal accident insurance of 5x annual salary. Covers death and disability due to accidents. Valid 24x7.
benefits.dental: Dental insurance covers routine checkups, fillings, root canal, extractions. Annual limit: ₹25,000 per family.
benefits.vision: Vision care includes annual eye checkup and ₹5,000 reimbursement for spectacles or contact lenses.
benefits.wellness: Annual health checkup provided free of cost. Includes blood tests, ECG, chest X-ray, doctor consultation. Preventive health package for employees above 40 years.
benefits.childcare: Onsite daycare facility available at nominal charges. Priority given to mothers returning from maternity leave.
benefits.transport: Company transport available for employees working in shifts. Pick-up and drop facility from designated points. Nominal monthly charge: ₹500.
benefits.relocation: Relocation assistance of 1 month gross salary for employees relocating for job. Includes packing, moving, and settling expenses.
benefits.stock: Stock options (ESOPs) available for senior management. Vesting period: 4 years with 1-year cliff. Can be exercised as per company policy.
benefits.parking: Free parking facility for all employees. Separate parking for two-wheelers, four-wheelers, and bicycles. EV charging points available.

workingHours.timing: Office hours are 9:30 AM to 6:30 PM, Monday to Friday. Total 8 working hours per day excluding lunch break.
workingHours.flexibility: Flexible timing allowed with prior approval. Core hours (11 AM - 4 PM) are mandatory. Early login/late logout allowed with manager approval.
workingHours.remote: Work from home allowed up to 2 days per week with manager approval. Permanent remote work options available for select roles.
workingHours.overtime: Overtime is compensated with comp-off for same hours worked beyond regular hours. Overtime must be pre-approved by manager. Not applicable for managerial roles.
workingHours.breaks: 1 hour lunch break and two 15-minute tea breaks allowed daily. Lunch break timing: 1 PM to 2 PM. Breaks can be taken flexibly during non-core hours.
workingHours.shifts: For 24x7 operations, shifts are rotational: Morning (6 AM-2 PM), Day (2 PM-10 PM), Night (10 PM-6 AM). Shift allowance: ₹200/day for night shifts.
workingHours.weekend: Saturday and Sunday are weekly offs. Occasionally Saturday working if required with advance notice. Alternate Saturday off for manufacturing units.
workingHours.attendance: Attendance marked through biometric system or web check-in for remote workers. Late coming beyond 30 minutes requires manager approval.
workingHours.latecoming: 3 instances of late coming (beyond 30 minutes) in a month result in 1 day casual leave deduction. Habitual late coming may affect performance rating.
workingHours.earlyLeaving: Early leaving requires manager approval. Frequent early leaving without approval may result in leave deduction or warning.
workingHours.compOff: Comp-off granted for working on holidays or weekends. Must be approved by manager. Comp-off must be availed within 90 days of earning it.
workingHours.nightShift: Night shift workers (10 PM to 6 AM) get additional ₹200 per day allowance. Free cab facility provided. Extra health checkups every 6 months.

dressCode.general: Business casual attire required. Neat and professional appearance mandatory. Jeans allowed with formal shirts. No shorts, slippers, or torn clothes.
dressCode.friday: Casual wear allowed on Fridays, but must be decent and appropriate. T-shirts with collar allowed. Avoid offensive graphics or text.
dressCode.clientMeeting: Formal business attire required when meeting clients or attending external events. Men: Suit or formal shirt-trousers. Women: Formal suit or saree.
dressCode.safety: Safety shoes mandatory in manufacturing areas. Hard hats required in construction zones. Lab coats mandatory in labs and clean rooms.
dressCode.id: Company ID card must be worn at all times in office premises. Required for building access, cafeteria, and parking entry.

holidays.count: 15 paid holidays per year including national and regional festivals. List includes Republic Day, Independence Day, Gandhi Jayanti, Diwali, Holi, Christmas, Eid.
holidays.list: Holiday calendar shared at the beginning of each year via email and company portal. Calendar includes restricted holidays and optional holidays.
holidays.optional: 3 optional holidays can be chosen by employee based on personal preference from list of 10 restricted holidays. Must be intimated to manager in advance.
holidays.sandwiching: Sandwiching of holidays is discouraged. Maximum 2 instances per year allowed. May require special approval from senior management.
holidays.working: If company requires working on gazetted holiday, double comp-off will be granted. Payment of double salary if comp-off not availed within 90 days.
holidays.regional: Regional holidays specific to state/location are applicable. Bangalore office follows Karnataka holidays. Mumbai office follows Maharashtra holidays.
holidays.floater: 2 floater holidays per year can be availed on any day with manager approval. Can be used for personal celebrations or religious occasions.

onboarding.process: New joiners undergo 1-week orientation covering company policies, systems, and team introductions. Includes sessions on culture, values, products, and tools.
onboarding.documents: Required documents: PAN card, Aadhaar, bank details, educational certificates, previous employment proof, passport size photos, previous employer relieving letter.
onboarding.buddy: Each new joiner is assigned a buddy for first 3 months to help with settling in. Buddy helps with introductions, queries, and navigating company culture.
onboarding.feedback: Onboarding feedback collected after 1 month and 3 months. HR conducts check-in meetings to address concerns and ensure smooth integration.
onboarding.training: Mandatory training includes IT security, workplace harassment prevention (POSH), code of conduct, company policies. Completion certificates required.
onboarding.kit: Welcome kit includes laptop, mouse, ID card, visiting cards, employee handbook, company merchandise (T-shirt, bag, water bottle).
onboarding.firstDay: First day includes HR induction, IT setup, workspace allocation, team lunch. Manager provides role overview and initial goals.
onboarding.credentials: Email ID, system login, payroll portal access, leave management system access provided on Day 1. VPN access for remote work within 3 days.

policies.confidentiality: Employees must not share confidential company information outside the organization. Includes client data, financial info, product details, strategies. NDA signed at joining.
policies.codeOfConduct: Professional behavior expected at all times. Harassment of any kind is strictly prohibited. Zero tolerance for discrimination based on gender, religion, caste, nationality.
policies.resignation: Minimum 30 days notice period for resignation. Senior positions require 60-90 days. Buyout of notice period possible with 2 months gross salary.
policies.nonCompete: Non-compete clause applicable for 6 months after leaving the organization. Cannot join direct competitors. Violation may result in legal action.
policies.dataProtection: All company and client data must be protected. No unauthorized sharing allowed. Data encryption mandatory. GDPR compliance for European data.
policies.smoking: Smoking allowed only in designated smoking zones. No smoking in office premises, washrooms, or parking areas. Violation may result in warning.
policies.alcohol: No alcohol consumption in office premises except company-organized events. Reporting to work under influence of alcohol is prohibited.
policies.socialMedia: Employees should not post confidential company information on social media. No negative posts about company, colleagues, or clients. Personal opinions should be clearly marked as personal.
policies.conflicts: Any conflict of interest must be disclosed to HR immediately. Includes financial interests, personal relationships with vendors/clients, outside employment.
policies.gifts: Accepting gifts from vendors/clients above ₹5,000 requires disclosure and approval. No cash gifts allowed. All gifts become company property above threshold.
policies.intellectualProperty: All work products, inventions, designs created during employment belong to company. Patent rights vest with company. Disclosure agreement signed at joining.
policies.moonlighting: Moonlighting or dual employment strictly prohibited without written approval from HR and senior management. May result in termination.
policies.whistleblower: Anonymous whistleblower mechanism available to report unethical practices. Protection guaranteed to whistleblowers. No retaliation policy strictly enforced.
policies.antiHarassment: POSH (Prevention of Sexual Harassment) policy in place. Internal Complaints Committee (ICC) available. Complaints handled confidentially within 90 days.

probation.duration: New employees have a probation period of 3 months from date of joining. Probation status clearly mentioned in offer letter.
probation.extension: Probation can be extended by another 3 months based on performance. Manager provides feedback and improvement plan for extended probation.
probation.benefits: All benefits are applicable during probation period including PF, insurance, leaves. Full salary and benefits from Day 1.
probation.termination: Either party can terminate employment with 1 week notice during probation. No severance pay applicable during probation period.
probation.confirmation: Probation confirmation depends on satisfactory performance and manager recommendation. Confirmation letter issued on successful completion.
probation.review: Performance review conducted at end of 2nd month (mid-probation) and 3rd month (final). Feedback documented and shared with employee.
probation.training: Probation period includes intensive training, shadowing, and hands-on projects. Learning curve expected and supported.

performance.frequency: Performance reviews are conducted twice a year - mid-year (June) and annual (December). Self-appraisal to be submitted before review meeting.
performance.criteria: Reviews are based on goal achievement (40%), teamwork (20%), innovation (20%), and leadership (20%). Weightages may vary by role level.
performance.feedback: Employees receive 360-degree feedback from managers, peers, and subordinates. Anonymous feedback encouraged for honest inputs.
performance.promotion: Promotions are considered during annual performance reviews based on consistent high performance. Minimum 2 years in current role typically required.
performance.pip: Performance Improvement Plan (PIP) initiated for underperformance with 90-day improvement period. Monthly reviews with specific goals. Support from manager and HR.
performance.ratings: 5-point rating scale: Outstanding (5), Exceeds Expectations (4), Meets Expectations (3), Needs Improvement (2), Unsatisfactory (1). Bell curve applied at organization level.
performance.goal: SMART goals set at beginning of year. Quarterly goal review meetings. Goals can be revised based on business changes with manager approval.
performance.calibration: Manager ratings calibrated with peer managers and senior management. Ensures fairness and consistency across teams.
performance.development: Individual Development Plan (IDP) created post review. Focus on skill development, career progression, training needs.

training.budget: Each employee has an annual training budget of ₹50,000. Can be used for courses, certifications, conferences, workshops.
training.courses: Employees can attend conferences, workshops, online courses, and certifications relevant to role. Platforms: Udemy, Coursera, LinkedIn Learning subscriptions provided.
training.approval: Training requests must be approved by manager and HR minimum 2 weeks in advance. Business relevance must be justified.
training.timeOff: Paid time off is provided for approved training programs. No leave deduction for attending approved training.
training.certification: Certification exam fees reimbursed upon successful completion and certificate submission. Popular certifications: PMP, AWS, Azure, Google Cloud, ITIL.
training.inhouse: In-house training programs conducted quarterly on leadership, technical skills, soft skills, compliance. Attendance mandatory for relevant programs.
training.freshers: Fresher training program of 3 months covering technical skills, soft skills, tools, domain knowledge. Mentorship assigned.
training.crossFunctional: Cross-functional training encouraged to understand different departments. Job rotation programs available for interested employees.
training.languages: Foreign language training provided for employees working with international clients. Languages: German, French, Spanish, Japanese.

expenses.travel: Business travel expenses are reimbursed within 15 days of submission with proper bills. Travel advance available on request.
expenses.mobile: ₹1,500 monthly reimbursement for mobile and internet expenses. Reimbursed through salary. No bills required.
expenses.fuel: Fuel reimbursement for two-wheelers: ₹2 per km, four-wheelers: ₹5 per km based on official travel. Odometer reading and fuel bills required.
expenses.submission: Expense claims must be submitted within 30 days with proper receipts. Delayed submissions may be rejected. Use expense management portal.
expenses.accommodation: Hotel stay reimbursed up to ₹3,000 per night for domestic travel, ₹8,000 for international. Higher amounts need pre-approval.
expenses.food: ₹500 per day food allowance for outstation travel. ₹1,500 per day for international travel. Bills required for amounts above ₹200.
expenses.taxi: Cab/taxi charges reimbursed for business travel. Uber/Ola bills accepted. Airport pickup/drop reimbursed.
expenses.flight: Economy class flights for domestic travel. Business class for international flights above 6 hours. Flight tickets booked through company travel desk.
expenses.perdiem: Per diem allowance for extended outstation stays: ₹1,000/day domestic, ₹50 USD/day international for miscellaneous expenses.
expenses.visa: Visa fees and passport charges reimbursed for business travel. Process initiated by HR. Employee submits documents.

it.laptop: Company-provided laptop must be returned upon resignation within 24 hours. Personal data must be backed up before return. Laptop remains company property.
it.software: Licensed software only. No pirated software allowed on company devices. Request software through IT ticketing system.
it.support: IT helpdesk available 24/7 for technical support. Email: itsupport@company.com, Phone: 1800-XXX-XXXX. Response time: 4 hours for critical issues.
it.backup: Regular backup of work data is mandatory to prevent data loss. Use company-provided cloud storage (1TB per employee). Weekly backup reminders sent.
it.security: Strong passwords required (min 12 characters, alphanumeric, special characters). 2-factor authentication mandatory for all systems. Password change every 90 days.
it.byod: Bring Your Own Device (BYOD) allowed with MDM (Mobile Device Management) installation. Company email can be accessed on personal devices.
it.vpn: VPN access mandatory for accessing company systems from outside office. Instructions provided by IT. Use company-approved VPN only.
it.email: Official email for business communication only. Personal use discouraged. Mailbox limit: 50GB. Archive old emails regularly.
it.access: System access based on role. Additional access requires manager approval. Access revoked immediately upon resignation for security.

grievance.process: Employees can raise grievances to HR (hr@company.com) or use anonymous grievance portal (grievance.company.com). Strict confidentiality maintained.
grievance.resolution: All grievances addressed within 15 working days. Acknowledgment sent within 24 hours. Resolution communicated via email.
grievance.escalation: Unresolved grievances can be escalated to senior management or CEO office. Escalation matrix available on company intranet.
grievance.whistleblower: Whistleblower protection provided for reporting unethical practices, fraud, harassment. Anonymous reporting available. Legal protection guaranteed.
grievance.ombudsman: Independent ombudsman available for sensitive issues. External third-party for unbiased investigation. Contact: ombudsman@company.com
grievance.committee: Internal Complaints Committee (ICC) for POSH cases. Grievance Redressal Committee for other workplace issues. Employee representatives included.
grievance.retaliation: Zero tolerance for retaliation against employees raising genuine grievances. Retaliatory action is grounds for disciplinary action against perpetrator.

exit.resignation: Submit resignation letter to manager and HR via email. Notice period as per company policy (30/60/90 days based on level).
exit.notice: Notice period can be served or bought out by paying equivalent gross salary. Buyout subject to manager and business approval.
exit.clearance: Exit clearance from all departments mandatory: IT (laptop, access cards), Admin (ID card, books), Finance (advance settlement), HR (full and final).
exit.interview: Exit interview conducted by HR to understand reasons for leaving and gather feedback. Feedback used for organizational improvements. Optional but encouraged.
exit.handover: Proper handover of responsibilities, projects, documents to be completed during notice period. Handover checklist provided by manager.
exit.settlement: Full and final settlement processed within 45 days of last working day. Includes pending salary, leave encashment, bonus, reimbursements, less recoveries.
exit.relieving: Relieving letter and experience certificate issued on last working day. Service certificate issued within 7 days of request.
exit.reference: Company provides employment reference letters upon request. References limited to dates of employment, designation, and general conduct.
exit.alumni: Company maintains alumni network. Alumni portal access for networking, job postings, events. Alumni eligible for referral bonus.

referral.bonus: Employee referral bonus: ₹25,000 for technical roles, ₹15,000 for non-technical roles. Paid after referred candidate completes 3 months.
referral.process: Submit referral through company careers portal. Referrer name auto-tagged. Referrer kept informed of application status.
referral.eligibility: All permanent employees eligible to refer. Cannot refer relatives (spouse, siblings, parents, children). Referrer must have completed probation.
referral.limit: No limit on number of referrals. Multiple bonuses allowed. Top referrers recognized quarterly.
referral.rejection: If referred candidate not selected, feedback shared with referrer. Candidate can reapply after 6 months for different role.

diversity.policy: Company committed to diversity and inclusion. Equal opportunity employer. No discrimination based on gender, religion, caste, nationality, disability, age.
diversity.womenEmpowerment: Special initiatives for women: flexi-hours for mothers, extended maternity leave, daycare facility, women safety committee, women leadership programs.
diversity.disability: Differently-abled friendly infrastructure. Ramps, elevators, accessible washrooms. Special recruitment drives. Assistive technology provided.
diversity.lgbtq: LGBTQ+ inclusive policies. Gender-neutral dress code. Same-sex partner benefits. Pride month celebrations. Ally training programs.
diversity.ageDiversity: No age limit for hiring. Experience valued. Senior employee mentorship programs. Retirement planning support.

rewards.spotAwards: Spot awards of ₹5,000-₹10,000 for exceptional contributions. Manager can nominate anytime. Cash + certificate.
rewards.quarterlyAwards: Best performer awards quarterly in each department. ₹25,000 cash + trophy + recognition in town hall.
rewards.annualAwards: Annual awards gala: Employee of Year (₹1 lakh), Rising Star (₹50,000), Best Team (₹1 lakh shared). All expenses paid for awards night with family.
rewards.longService: Long service awards: 5 years (gold coin), 10 years (vacation package), 15 years (car/bike), 25 years (special recognition + sabbatical).
rewards.innovation: Innovation awards for new ideas, process improvements, patents. Quarterly cycle. Winning ideas implemented with credit. ₹50,000 for best innovation.

workLifeBalance.flexible: Flexible working arrangements available: flexi-hours, work from home, compressed work week, part-time options for specific situations.
workLifeBalance.mentalHealth: Mental health support: Free counseling sessions, Employee Assistance Program (EAP), stress management workshops, meditation rooms.
workLifeBalance.familySupport: Emergency leave for family medical situations. Parental care leave. Elder care support. Family day events.
workLifeBalance.hobbies: Hobby clubs: Sports (cricket, football, badminton), Arts (painting, photography), Music, Book club, Trekking. Company sponsors equipment/events.
workLifeBalance.celebrations: Monthly birthday celebrations. Festival celebrations (Diwali, Christmas, Holi, Eid). Annual day. Family picnic. Sports day.
